title: {{giant|Gigantism Plus}}
description:
Adds a modified version of the base-game's {{gigantism|Gigantism}} defect.

Unlike other defects, this one has a mutation level which can be increased with mutation points and even rapidly advanced!

Also included is the active ability "Hunch Over" which will allow gigantic creatures to enter spaces they otherwise wouldn't fit.
No more end-game softlock!
author: {{metamorphic|hydnplynsyt}} and {{K-g-G-Y-G-g-K alternation|UnderDoug}}
